update.releaseNotes: Version 1.6.0 release. Changelog: - Added a silence mode. This will allow you to mute the alarm whilst already on the job. It'll save you from having multiple alarms triggering from lots of SMS messages. - Thank you for using the app. Please keep up the reporting of any issues you find! If you're stuggling to update the app automaticly, please use this link http://bit.ly/sarcall-alarm
